BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20105348 HKX (N 100226 HKX), pursuant to §3020 of the Charter of the City of New York, concerning the designation (List No.425, LP-2370) by the Landmarks Preservation Commission of the Dollar Savings Bank located at 2792 Third Avenue, as a historic landmark, Council District no. 17.
